law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Beneficial owner" means a person for whose benefit a boat broker is entrusted to hold money.
"Boat" means any vessel that is propelled by sail or machinery in the water.
"Boat broker" means a person who provides boat brokerage services for another person.
"Boat broker trust account" means an account that a broker maintains at a financial institution for the deposit of trust money.
"Trust money" means a deposit, payment, or other money that a person entrusts to a boat broker to hold for the benefit of the person or a beneficial owner.
